scripts.alpha: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha && yarn run deploy:functions && yarn run deploy:rules
scripts.beta: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta && yarn run deploy:functions && yarn run deploy:rules
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run clean:tsbuildinfo
scripts.master: yarn run swap:master && firebase use master && yarn run deploy:functions && yarn run deploy:rules
scripts.staging:alpha: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha && yarn run deploy:staging-functions
scripts.staging:beta: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta && yarn run deploy:staging-functions
scripts.staging:master: yarn run swap:master && firebase use master && yarn run deploy:staging-functions
